ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:21:57 [Issue ID 4000-117844] urn:comicvine:4000-117844 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:00:02. [Issue ID 371337]
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 4: Mission Accomplished: Grey has snapped the Hulk's neck and Ryker gloats as his most hated enemy lies on the ground defeated. The Hulk quickly recovers, however and beats the Gamma Corps down. Hulk addresses their grievances against him and turns the team against Ryker who has genetically altered them into freaks for his own selfish ends.
ComicInfo.Title: Part 4: Mission Accomplished
